title: Grand Reopening: Phuket Beachfront Escape with Daily Breakfast, Cocktails & Three Dinners
description:
Reopening its doors for those seeking a relaxing Phuket escape within easy reach of the action, the new Oceanfront Beach Resort and Spa is peacefully positioned less than a 10-minute drive from Patong's vibrant centre.

A modern tropical paradise featuring a glistening lagoon pool framed by swaying palms with a swim-up bar, an enviable beachfront locale, two restaurants, and a rooftop bar with ocean views, Oceanfront Beach Resort and Spa is ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor. From this dreamy resort, you can venture into Patong to experience its local restaurants, buzzing nightlife, and neon lights, go kayaking in sea caves at Phang Na Bay, or take a day trip to Old Town Phuket.
